Name: Khan VS Kahn
About the game: Khan VS Kahn is a turn-based strategy game. Challenge a friend in a 1v1 Duel where only the smartest wins every time. Modes : - Hotseat against a friend - Online Multiplayer with Steam Friend - Against the AI (4 races to fight with increasing difficulty) A mix between European board games and sid meier's civilization Two races compete to be the best and achieve one of the 5 victory types You can use your enemy's building, but be careful, he can use yours! Which kind of victory are you going to achieve?
Meta Title: Khan VS Kahn: Aug 27, 2019, Black Potion and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Khan VS Kahn? Check out the release date (Aug 27, 2019), developer insights from Black Potion, and a complete game summary.
